description: WHATS NEW  (v1.5.0)Added two new apps - (1)Expenses to calculate just about any type of expense and email them,(2) Blood Press Recorder - Records blood pressure data with the ability to email and export into Excel. ABOUT APPBOX: Appbox is a collection of twenty apps (20) for the Palm that almost everyone can use. Apps include passwords, days until, birthdays, converter, weight tracker, fuel log, loan calculator, tip calculator, grocery comparison, scientific calculator, countdown, stop watch,expenses,flashlight and many more. Your data is always securely stored on the non media partition. The dashboard allows complete customization of apps including adding, deleting and reordering apps. See help inside App for more details. NOTE: Only seven apps are preinstalled on your dashboard. Use the "+" menu button to add more apps. ABOUT THE TRIAL VERSION:  The trial version allows you to run Appbox a limited number of times and restricts the number of items you can create. Appbox Lite is the exact replica of the full version (minus the restrictions) giving you the best demonstration of all the capabilities of Appbox. Give it a try today. Its FREE.
